column3: Traffic;Kampot:------  On the evening of Sept. 23
column5: a man died while being sent to a hospital and another woman was seriously injured. The motorcycle they were travelling on hit a cows that was crossing National Road 3 at Trapeang Ses village
column7: Kampot province. Both injured people were taken to hospital
column8: but the 23 year old male later died. The police force is investigating and searching for the owner of the cow.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/261892------
